artist: Designer: Jack Larsen; Producer: Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description: 3/8" horiz. strips of leather woven alternately with smooth and split side of hide on face. Black warp. .25-.50" Tan, grey, green & white leather and/or vinyl strips separated by tan weft threads. Stapled & glued to 8.5 x 11" card. "H-3" printed on card. (black,green, grey, tan, white)
image_copyright: © Jack Lenor Larsen%2C Inc. %2F Leather Cloth%2C Jack Larsen%2C 1956
title: Leather Cloth
